com.rivescript

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rivescript.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    An object to represent an individual user's data.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Client(java.lang.String id)
      Create a new client object.
